issue.title: [Java][Docs] Synch Java code tutorial with Java cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16170](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16170). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update java cookbooks to be aligned with last java tutorial documentation
